description: Header file declaring functions, constants, and default values related to network device status management, including harvesting status, reporting and polling periods, and default configurations.

methods.name: SetNDSHarvestingStatus
methods.description: Sets the harvesting status for network devices, accepts a BOOL indicating enabled or disabled.

methods.name: GetNDSHarvestingStatus
methods.description: Retrieves the current harvesting status for network devices, returns a BOOL.

methods.name: SetNDSReportingPeriod
methods.description: Sets the reporting period for network device scans, based on provided seconds.

methods.name: GetNDSReportingPeriod
methods.description: Gets the current reporting period in seconds.

methods.name: SetNDSPollingPeriod
methods.description: Sets the polling period for network devices, based on provided seconds.

methods.name: GetNDSReportingPeriodDefault
methods.description: Gets the default reporting period value.

methods.name: SetNDSReportingPeriodDefault
methods.description: Sets the default reporting period value.

methods.name: GetNDSPollingPeriodDefault
methods.description: Gets the default polling period value.

methods.name: SetNDSPollingPeriodDefault
methods.description: Sets the default polling period value.

methods.name: GetNDSOverrideTTLDefault
methods.description: Retrieves the default timeout for accelerated scans.

methods.name: ValidateNDSPeriod
methods.description: Validates if a given period value is within acceptable range.

methods.name: SetNDSOverrideTTL
methods.description: Sets the override TTL for network device scans.
